articles.description: OUTLANDER viewers were shocked this weekend when yet another character was brutally killed off - but now Stephen Bonnet star Edward Speleers has spoken out about the supposed mercy Brianna Fraser gave the villain in his last moments.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Idris Elba denies suggesting annual week of lockdown - Sky News
articles.description: "I suggested a way of remembrance annually" rather than an annual quarantine, Idris Elba has clarified on social media.

articles.author: Jessica Williams
articles.title: Too Hot To Handle star dishes all about unseen heart monitor challenge that never aired - Express
articles.description: TOO HOT TO HANDLE contestant David Birtwistle has revealed how stars took on a heart monitor challenge that was scrapped from the program.
articles.content:
"I feel like from day one we hit it off. For me, it was like love at first sight - I was infatuated with her," he grinned.
"And even the fact those rules were announced, I knew I still wanted to pursue it."
